Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Automatically extends enrollment of individuals in certain programs in response to novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)
Summary: Automatically extends enrollment of individuals in the rent increase exemption program for low income elderly persons and persons with disabilities pursuant to section 467-b or 467-c of the real property tax law, the senior citizen homeowners' exemption program pursuant to section 467 of the real property tax law or the disabled homeowners' exemption program pursuant to section 459-c of the real property tax law until January 1, 2021 in response to novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
ActClause: AN ACT to automatically extend the enrollment of individuals in certain programs in response to novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)
